## Vault class

A combination of collateral and debt.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Vault 
```

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `Vault` class.

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [collateral](./lib-base.vault.collateral.md) |  | [Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md) | Amount of native currency (e.g. Ether) collateralized. |
|  [debt](./lib-base.vault.debt.md) |  | [Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md) | Amount of BPD owed. |
|  [isEmpty](./lib-base.vault.isempty.md) |  | boolean |  |
|  [netDebt](./lib-base.vault.netdebt.md) |  | [Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md) | Amount of BPD that must be repaid to close this Vault. |
